services.description: Autosuggest and autocomplete via the HERE Geocoding & Search API v7.

methods.name: SuggestAsync
methods.description: Get location suggestions as the user types.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Optional parameters like language, limit, and geographic filter.

properties.name: Limit
properties.description: Maximum number of results to return. Default: 5.

properties.name: Lang
properties.description: Language for results (BCP 47 tag, e.g. "de", "en"). Default: "de".

properties.name: At
properties.description: Geographic bias location. Results near this position are ranked higher.

methods.name: AutocompleteAsync
methods.description: Get autocomplete suggestions for addresses and places (no position returned).

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Optional parameters like language, limit, and geographic filter.

properties.name: Limit
properties.description: Maximum number of results to return. Default: 5.

properties.name: Lang
properties.description: Language for results (BCP 47 tag, e.g. "de", "en"). Default: "de".

properties.name: At
properties.description: Geographic bias location. Results near this position are ranked higher.

services.description: Search for EV charging stations via the HERE EV Charge Points API v3.

methods.name: SearchStationsAsync
methods.description: Search for EV charging stations near a position.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Request parameters for EV Charge Points API station search.

properties.name: ConnectorTypes
properties.description: Optional filter for specific connector types.

services.description: Forward and reverse geocoding via the HERE Geocoding & Search API v7.

methods.name: GeocodeAsync
methods.description: Convert a free-text address or place name into geographic coordinates.

properties.name: BoundingBox
properties.description: Optional bounding box to narrow results (format: "south,west,north,east").

methods.name: ReverseGeocodeAsync
methods.description: Convert geographic coordinates into an address.

properties.name: BoundingBox
properties.description: Optional bounding box to narrow results (format: "south,west,north,east").

services.description: Client-side geofence checks — point-in-polygon and point-in-circle without any HTTP call.

methods.name: CheckPositionAsync
methods.description: Check whether a position falls inside any of the given geofence zones (polygon or circle).

services.description: Calculate combined transport routes via the HERE Intermodal Routing API v8.

methods.name: CalculateRouteAsync
methods.description: Calculate an intermodal route combining walking, transit, and other modes.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Request parameters for the Intermodal Routing API.

properties.name: Alternatives
properties.description: Number of alternative routes to calculate.

properties.name: ReturnPolyline
properties.description: Whether to return polylines for each section (default true).

properties.name: ReturnTravelSummary
properties.description: Whether to return travel summary per section (default true).

services.description: Calculate reachable areas (isochrones and isodistances) via the HERE Isoline Routing API v8.

methods.name: CalculateIsolineAsync
methods.description: Compute one or more isolines from a center point within given range values.

properties.name: Center
properties.description: Center position for the isoline calculation.

properties.name: Ranges
properties.description: Range values (seconds for time, meters for distance).

services.description: Generate static map images via the HERE Map Image API v3.

methods.name: GetImageAsync
methods.description: Get a static map image as a byte array.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Request parameters for the Map Image API.

properties.name: Center
properties.description: Center position of the map image.

properties.name: Ppi
properties.description: Pixels per inch scaling factor (default 72). Use 250 or 320 for high-DPI.

services.description: Compute travel time and distance matrices via the HERE Matrix Routing API v8.

methods.name: CalculateMatrixAsync
methods.description: Calculate a routing matrix between multiple origins and destinations. Returns duration and distance for each origin-destination pair.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Request parameters for matrix routing calculation.

properties.name: DepartureTime
properties.description: Optional departure time for time-aware routing.

services.description: Discover, browse, and look up places via the HERE Geocoding & Search API v7.

methods.name: DiscoverAsync
methods.description: Free-text search for places near a given position.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Request parameters for Places API (discover, browse, lookup).

properties.name: Id
properties.description: HERE Place ID for lookup requests.

methods.name: BrowseAsync
methods.description: Browse places by category near a given position.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Request parameters for Places API (discover, browse, lookup).

properties.name: Id
properties.description: HERE Place ID for lookup requests.

methods.name: LookupAsync
methods.description: Look up a single place by its HERE Place ID.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Request parameters for Places API (discover, browse, lookup).

properties.name: Id
properties.description: HERE Place ID for lookup requests.

services.description: Transit departures and station search via the HERE Public Transit API v8.

methods.name: GetDeparturesAsync
methods.description: Get live departures from the nearest transit station to a given position.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Position to find nearest station departures.

methods.name: SearchStationsAsync
methods.description: Search for transit stations within a given radius around a position.

services.description: Match GPS traces to road segments via the HERE Route Matching API v8.

methods.name: MatchRouteAsync
methods.description: Match a sequence of GPS trace points to road segments.

properties.name: TracePoints
properties.description: GPS trace points to match against the road network.

services.description: Route calculation via the HERE Routing API v8. Supports car, truck, pedestrian, bicycle, scooter, and EV routing.

methods.name: CalculateRouteAsync
methods.description: Calculate a route between an origin and destination, with optional via waypoints, avoidance features, truck, and EV parameters.

properties.name: ReturnPolyline
properties.description: Whether to return the route polyline.

properties.name: Alternatives
properties.description: Number of alternative routes to calculate.

properties.name: ReturnInstructions
properties.description: When true, the response includes turn-by-turn instructions.

properties.name: Truck
properties.description: Truck-specific parameters (only used when TransportMode is Truck).

properties.name: Height
properties.description: Vehicle height in meters (converted to cm for the API).

properties.name: Width
properties.description: Vehicle width in meters (converted to cm for the API).

properties.name: Length
properties.description: Vehicle length in meters (converted to cm for the API).

properties.name: MaxChargeAfterChargingStation
properties.description: Maximum charge after a charging station stop in kWh.

properties.name: MinChargeAtChargingStation
properties.description: Minimum charge required at a charging station in kWh.

properties.name: MinChargeAtDestination
properties.description: Minimum charge required at destination in kWh.

properties.name: FreeFlowSpeedTable
properties.description: Free-flow speed consumption table: speed(km/h),consumption(kWh/km) pairs.

services.description: Optimize fleet vehicle tours via the HERE Tour Planning API v3.

methods.name: SolveAsync
methods.description: Solve a tour planning problem synchronously.

parameters.name: problem
parameters.description: A tour planning problem to optimize vehicle routes for deliveries and pickups.

properties.name: Plan
properties.description: The plan containing jobs to be fulfilled.

properties.name: Jobs
properties.description: Jobs to schedule across the fleet.

properties.name: Types
properties.description: Vehicle types available in the fleet.

services.description: Real-time traffic incidents and flow data via the HERE Traffic API v7.

methods.name: GetTrafficIncidentsAsync
methods.description: Get traffic incidents (accidents, construction, congestion, etc.) within a bounding box.

methods.name: GetTrafficFlowAsync
methods.description: Get real-time traffic flow data (speed, jam factor) within a bounding box.

services.description: Optimize waypoint order for minimum travel time or distance via the HERE Waypoint Sequence API v8.

methods.name: OptimizeSequenceAsync
methods.description: Given a start, end, and intermediate waypoints, find the optimal visiting order.

properties.name: End
properties.description: End position (can be same as Start for round-trip).

properties.name: Waypoints
properties.description: Waypoints to optimize the sequence for.

services.description: Weather observations and forecasts via the HERE Destination Weather API v3.

methods.name: GetWeatherAsync
methods.description: Get weather observations and/or forecasts for a location.

properties.name: Location
properties.description: Location to get weather for (latitude, longitude).

enums.name: ConnectorType
enums.description: EV connector type identifiers used by the HERE EV Charge Points API.

enums.name: HazardousGoods
enums.description: Hazardous goods categories (flags enum for multi-select).

enums.name: MapImageFormat
enums.description: Output format for static map images.

enums.name: MapImageStyle
enums.description: Map style for static map images.

enums.name: RoutingAvoidFeature
enums.description: Features to avoid in route calculation.

enums.name: WeatherProduct
enums.description: Weather product types available from the HERE Destination Weather API.

resultTypes.name: AutocompleteResult
resultTypes.description: Result of a HERE Autocomplete API call.

resultTypes.name: AutosuggestAddress
resultTypes.description: Structured address details from a HERE Autosuggest result.

resultTypes.name: AutosuggestHighlights
resultTypes.description: Highlight information indicating which portions of the title match the query.

properties.name: Title
properties.description: Highlight ranges for the title field.

properties.name: Address
properties.description: Highlight ranges for the address label.

resultTypes.name: AutosuggestItem
resultTypes.description: A single result item from the HERE Autosuggest API.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: HERE place ID (can be used for lookup/details).

properties.name: Position
properties.description: Geographic coordinates of the result, if available. May be null for some result types (e.g. categoryQuery).

properties.name: Highlights
properties.description: Highlight ranges for matching text portions.

resultTypes.name: AutosuggestResult
resultTypes.description: Result of a HERE Autosuggest API call.

resultTypes.name: EvChargePointsResult
resultTypes.description: Result of an EV Charge Points API search.

resultTypes.name: EvConnector
resultTypes.description: A single EV charging connector at a station.

properties.name: SupplierName
properties.description: Name of the charging network supplier.

properties.name: ConnectorTypeName
properties.description: Display name of the connector type (e.g. "Type 2", "CCS").

properties.name: ChargeCapacity
properties.description: Number of vehicles that can charge simultaneously.

properties.name: FixedCable
properties.description: Whether the connector has a fixed (tethered) cable.

resultTypes.name: EvStation
resultTypes.description: An EV charging station with its connectors.

properties.name: TotalNumberOfConnectors
properties.description: Total number of connectors at this station.

resultTypes.name: GeocodeItem
resultTypes.description: A single geocoding result item.

resultTypes.name: GeocodeResult
resultTypes.description: Result of a geocoding request.

resultTypes.name: GeofenceCheckResult
resultTypes.description: Result of a geofence check.

properties.name: IsInside
properties.description: Whether the position is inside any of the checked zones.

properties.name: MatchedZoneIds
properties.description: IDs of zones the position is inside.

resultTypes.name: IntermodalPlace
resultTypes.description: A departure or arrival place in an intermodal route section.

resultTypes.name: IntermodalRoute
resultTypes.description: A single intermodal route consisting of multiple transport sections.

properties.name: Sections
properties.description: Ordered sections of the route (e.g. walk → transit → walk).

resultTypes.name: IntermodalRoutingResult
resultTypes.description: Result of an Intermodal Routing API request.

resultTypes.name: IntermodalSection
resultTypes.description: A single section of an intermodal route (e.g. pedestrian, transit, etc.).

resultTypes.name: IntermodalSummary
resultTypes.description: Travel summary for an intermodal route section.

resultTypes.name: IntermodalTransport
resultTypes.description: Transport details for a transit section.

resultTypes.name: IsolinePolygon
resultTypes.description: A single isoline polygon.

properties.name: EncodedPolyline
properties.description: Encoded flexible polyline (for C#-side decoding if JS decoding failed).

resultTypes.name: IsolineResult
resultTypes.description: Result of an isoline calculation.

resultTypes.name: LatLngLiteral
resultTypes.description: Represents a geographic coordinate with latitude and longitude. Compatible with HERE Maps {lat, lng} format.

resultTypes.name: MatchedLink
resultTypes.description: A road segment matched to a GPS trace by the HERE Route Matching API.

properties.name: LinkId
properties.description: HERE link ID for the matched road segment.

properties.name: SpeedLimit
properties.description: Speed limit on the road segment in km/h, if available.

properties.name: FunctionalClass
properties.description: Functional class of the road (1-5, where 1 = major highway).

properties.name: Geometry
properties.description: Geometry of the matched road segment.

resultTypes.name: MatrixEntry
resultTypes.description: A single entry in the routing matrix.

properties.name: OriginIndex
properties.description: Index of the origin in the request.

properties.name: DestinationIndex
properties.description: Index of the destination in the request.

resultTypes.name: MatrixRoutingResult
resultTypes.description: Result of a matrix routing calculation.

properties.name: NumOrigins
properties.description: Number of origins in the matrix.

properties.name: NumDestinations
properties.description: Number of destinations in the matrix.

properties.name: Matrix
properties.description: Matrix entries containing travel times and distances.

resultTypes.name: PlaceContact
resultTypes.description: Contact information for a place.

resultTypes.name: PlaceItem
resultTypes.description: A single place result item.

properties.name: Distance
properties.description: Distance from the search center in meters.

properties.name: PlaceId
properties.description: HERE Place ID for subsequent lookup requests.

resultTypes.name: PlacesResult
resultTypes.description: Result of a Places API request.

resultTypes.name: Route
resultTypes.description: A single calculated route.

resultTypes.name: RouteMatchingResult
resultTypes.description: Result from the HERE Route Matching API.

properties.name: Warnings
properties.description: Warnings or informational messages from the matching process.

resultTypes.name: RouteSection
resultTypes.description: A section of a route between two waypoints.

properties.name: Polyline
properties.description: Encoded flexible polyline for this section.

properties.name: Transport
properties.description: Transport mode used for this section.

properties.name: TurnByTurnActions
properties.description: Turn-by-turn instructions (populated when ReturnInstructions is true).

resultTypes.name: RouteSummary
resultTypes.description: Summary information for a route section.

properties.name: BaseDuration
properties.description: Base duration without traffic in seconds.

resultTypes.name: RoutingResult
resultTypes.description: Result of a route calculation.

resultTypes.name: Tour
resultTypes.description: An optimized tour for a single vehicle.

properties.name: VehicleId
properties.description: Identifier of the vehicle assigned to this tour.

resultTypes.name: TourActivity
resultTypes.description: An activity at a tour stop (e.g. delivery, pickup, departure, arrival).

properties.name: JobId
properties.description: Associated job identifier (null for departure/arrival activities).

resultTypes.name: TourPlanningResult
resultTypes.description: Result of a tour planning optimization.

properties.name: UnassignedJobs
properties.description: Job IDs that could not be assigned to any vehicle.

resultTypes.name: TourStatistic
resultTypes.description: Statistics for a tour or overall solution.

resultTypes.name: TourStop
resultTypes.description: A stop within a tour.

resultTypes.name: TrafficFlowItem
resultTypes.description: A traffic flow data item.

properties.name: FreeFlowSpeed
properties.description: Free-flow speed in km/h (speed without traffic).

resultTypes.name: TrafficFlowResult
resultTypes.description: Result containing traffic flow data.

resultTypes.name: TrafficIncident
resultTypes.description: A traffic incident from the HERE Traffic API.

properties.name: RoadName
properties.description: Road name where the incident occurs.

resultTypes.name: TrafficIncidentsResult
resultTypes.description: Result containing traffic incidents.

resultTypes.name: TransitDeparture
resultTypes.description: A departure from a public transit station.

resultTypes.name: TransitDeparturesResult
resultTypes.description: Result containing transit departures.

resultTypes.name: TransitStation
resultTypes.description: A transit station.

properties.name: Distance
properties.description: Distance from search center in meters.

properties.name: TransportTypes
properties.description: Transport types available at this station.

resultTypes.name: TransitStationsResult
resultTypes.description: Result containing transit stations.

resultTypes.name: TurnInstruction
resultTypes.description: A single turn-by-turn instruction in a route section.

properties.name: Duration
properties.description: Duration for this maneuver in seconds.

properties.name: Length
properties.description: Length for this maneuver in meters.

properties.name: Offset
properties.description: Index offset into the polyline where this maneuver starts.

resultTypes.name: WaypointSequenceResult
resultTypes.description: Result of waypoint sequence optimization.

properties.name: OptimizedIndices
properties.description: Optimized waypoint indices (original ordering mapped to optimal).

properties.name: OptimizedWaypoints
properties.description: Optimized waypoints in the recommended order.

resultTypes.name: WeatherForecast
resultTypes.description: A weather forecast entry from the HERE Weather API.

resultTypes.name: WeatherObservation
resultTypes.description: A current weather observation from the HERE Weather API.

properties.name: DewPoint
properties.description: Dew point temperature in degrees Celsius.

resultTypes.name: WeatherResult
resultTypes.description: Result from the HERE Destination Weather API.

properties.name: Forecasts
properties.description: Forecast entries (when a forecast product was requested).
